S.FORM: == Tay-lu-ke-kuo-cia-kun-yen 太魯閣國家公園 == Tay-lu-ke-kuo-cia-kun-yen " Taluku a kamu: Rngayan qmita kana klwaan Truku" u Cung-hau-min-kuo sakasepat nu nipatidenga tu kanatal kunyen. sakatusa a nikalepacawan nu kanatal a tataydaan midang, caysiwwalnem mihcaan cacay bulad caytu demiad pakatineng tu kiyaku, caysiwwalnem mihcaan caycay bulad tuwal demiad mapatideng ku mamikuwan a kakulian. Itida i Taywan Walian, milakuuyt tu Kalinku, Tayciu, Nantuo tulu a naniyadu'an. ilabu idaw ku wali nitipan a mibetasay tu buyu'a dadanan, pangangan han u Cungheng dadan. picidekan nu Tayluku a kuo-cia-kun-yen u dihep atu nanggay, mutikel tu ku nanggay, bangcal sapi'," Tay-lu-ke nangnanggayan" sisa singangan tu sakawalu nu Taywan aaidangan. duma satu ilabu nu buyubuyuan idaw henay ku madiputay nu yadahay a kacudetay nu nanum a mahicaay nu nanumay a cilekayan, mahida u buting aca. . "Tay-lu-ke-kuo-cia-kun-yen" tada mutikel tu ku nanggay, sasawacan, ahebalay nu lalaliwan nu nanum malasapihpih ku lalaliwan atu dihep nu kitidaan, matatungus tu kitakid nu namakababalakiay nu malucekay tu sakapitu: atu sawsawni celak saca a talakaw, sisa masatanektekay nu talakaway a dihepan nu aadihan a Tayluke, u canancanan nu yadahay atu picidekan nu matatungusay i kitakidan a nikasinganganan tu mamalucek a sakasiwan nu silacan, sisa, caay henay ka lungad ku nipalumaan tu kilakilangan, sisa yadah ku canancanan nu tuudan a aadupan tu sasapapahanhannan yadah ku mhicacay a aadupan atu caayay a sausi nu cancanan, masasuida namin ku nuheni, matatungusay nu kitikid a naliwnan namaka babalakiay ni tukian nu matatungusay a sakacacay a bataan , sisa ina wen-ha-pu mapili' u Taywan kitakid namaka babalakiay a liwan nu tataydaan midang. " . ngangan 名稱 "Tayluke" atu " Taluku" nina sulit u namaka Tayluke binacadan nipanganganan tu " Truku". sabaw enem a secian nu ayaw nikudan, Sedi'k tademaw namaka Nan-tuo milakuuyt tu Cung-yen-san-may a buyu'an mabulaw taynin i Kalingku a Li-u'-si, Mu-kua-si, sa muenengay i Kalingkuay a binacadan tu palutatengaan tu udip, sisa pangngan han tu " Tayluke binacadan". tada ngihan u " Truku", i kaDipunan singangan tu "Taroko", nikahinian tunika enengan nu heni itini tu kasingangan. " "Truku".16 "Truku" ,日治時期被稱為"Taroko" ," . luit歷史沿革 nina kiyaku taneng tanuayawan ku nipilalaba tu kaDipunan nu kiyaku a Tayluke kuocia kungyen. Caysiwlupic mihcaan sabaw tusa a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a demiadan, Tay-wan-cung-tu-hu Kuo-li-kun-yen pakatineng " sakatusa nu talakaw Tayluke Kuoli kunyen" mapatideng, pasu aydaay a Sea-san atu Tay-lu-ke a kitidaan, nikitidaan makaala tu tusa abataan idaw ku pitu a wangan nu kubuan, nika i ka Dipunan hedeken palawpesen. 65 263 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku enem nu mihcaan tu siwa a bulad, Taywan nu hitay a sakakaay ci Ten-cun-liw, itida i Kalinku mididaw sa itida i Tayluke sacumud atu ilabuay nu talakaway mu buis a tademaw ci Sun-pen-ta-cuo, Lin-ten-hu-kun, Di-cu mapulung a misasing. 1936年 9月, . katukuh tu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku siwa a mihcaan, u Sin-cen-yen mapatucek tu " Taywan kitidaan nu pulung sapitadas a kiyaku", patucek hank u Tayluke a kitidaan, Cung-heng dadan, He-hun-san itidaay atu Su-hua dadan u kanatal a kunyen atu kanatal a dadan nu kunyen, sadikuday i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idw ku sepat a mihcaan mihedek tu nikakenihan tu kanatal a kunyenan. Cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku enem a mihcaan sabaw cacay a bulad sabaw tusa a demiad, kiyaku nu Tayluke kanatal a kunyen tatengan pakatineng, kitidaan nu kanatal a kunyen timul amis nu tanayu hakiya makaala tu 38 kun-li, wali nutipan a ahebal hakiya makaala tu 41 kun-li, kitidaan pulung han 92,000 a kubuan, mapulung tu kakulian pasuKalinku Siw-lin-sing 74,800 a kubuan, Tay-cung-se he-pin-ci 9,500 kubu atu Nan-tuo-sin Zen-ay-sing 7,700 kubu, Tayluke kanatal kun-yen pipahalhalan atu sayaway nu sakakaay a cu'-cen u Kuo-li-tun-hua-ta-sye ce-zan-ce-yen kun-li yen-ciw-suo u sakakaay ci Si-kuo-se. 至1979年, . tuseptusip mihcaan sepat bulad tulu demiad, ninelan nu Kalingku mapelad ku Tayluke kanatal kunyen, micidek ku caculilan i buyubuyuan, dekalun caculilan, padaicawan a caculilan, sakatang caculilan, payyeng caculilan atu cemu sangaw caculilan a aaidangan atu sakayhekal nu dadanan mamin mapelad, pinaay hakiya nu taydaay midang a maduka mapatay atu pinaay nu malebutan a midangay mapulu' i labu nu aaidangan, tawya nikaninelan nu Tayluke kanatal kun-yen mikuwanay patahekal musakamu acaay pacumud tu tayniay midang sa, misangaay a tademaw ayaan hakiya a masangan nai' ku watan, pu'tan ku sakatayda katukuh tu nikakapah kiya tawya musakamu taneng tu a micumud sa. 2024年4月3日, . hida sananay a liwliw 自然環境 kanatal aidangan mitulin tu Tay-pin-yeng, Cung-yen-sa-may amis milakuuyt tu aaidangan, satalakaway nu aaidangan makaala tu 3,742 kunce a Nan-hu buyu'. talakaw makaala tu tulu a malebut nu pinaay anika talakawan nu cu'detay a kitidaan kakitidaan makaala tu kanatal kun-yen a liklikan tu 7.2%, saka itini i cacay a lasubuan nu Taywan tu buyu' an nu pulung tu sakatusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a buyu'an. cacay a malebut katukuh tulu a malebut nu dihekuay a buyu'an nu kitidaan mamin makaala tu 78.4%, salikelun 55% a kitidaan miala tu aaidangan tu 44.7%. 44.7%. nanum namakaydaay namin i Cung-yen-san-may nu nikakenisan a nananuman, walian nu angangan u Li-u-si kapulungan a nanuman, miala tu kanatal a lalaan 65.7%, adidi' ku i Mu-kua-si atu San-cen-si nu lalaliwan nu nanuman, tipan makakenih u Ta-cia-si atu Cuo-suu-si pabawan, ninatusaay a masabanaway a tangkuan miala tu kanatal tu lala'an a 20%. 20%. pulung nu timul, amis talakaw ku lala', iteban han u O-ya-ba'tu atu Huy-li-pin ba'tu sakababateluan a kakenisan atu Tay-pin-yen nutipan a kacaledesan kasibaliyusan nu tabakiay a udadan nu kitidaan, sisa mahicaay kiya kina kitidaan. matulin tu a misaamelik misangan tu buyu'an, atu Li-u-si kasenu' sa mahetik, malamahicaay kiya a buyu'an, u dihep han tu. likecu ku Tay-lu-ke mala V yan nu daylisiki a dihepan, ilabu milakuuyt tu 1,000 kun-ce, kibetul nu daylisiki u kibetul makaala tu malebut nu pina a kun-cean, nikalahatan makaala tu pina nu cacay a bataan nu ku-lian. 全區南, V . maudipay nu canacanan 生態 saan ku nipikinsaan, ilabu idaw tu kunikaadihan tu tuudan nu canananan nu maudipay a cicilekayan tu 1,517 an. ilabu nu buyubuyu'an idaw ku 46 a micucuay nu aadupan, mikiala tu Tay-wan i enelay nu micucuay a aadupan tu pangkiwan. sabaw lima ku nu Taywanay a micidekay nu aadupan, i Taywan u nueduan ku sayadahay a aadupan.u ayam hantu makaala tu 173 a canancananan, pasuTaywan picidekan nu ayaman makaala tu 24 a kakenisan, nikakenisan namaka Cung-heng dadan Ta-yi-lin katukuh i Ce-n sayadahay nu ayaman itida. . tademaw lalangawan nu aadihan人文景觀 ayda idaw tu kunikaadihan tu liwan namaka babalakiay, itida i Li-u-si tapang nu kawanan, panan nu Tayluku nu ayawan 100 nu pina a kun-ce pabaway nu nanuman, micapiay tu kanatal kun-yen kiyakuan a Hu-se liwan nu namaka babalakiay a kitidaan, katukuh ayda makaala tu 2,000 a luitan. kanatal kun-yen naw Tayluku a binacadan nu kitidaan, Malahat kina niyadu', dumaan tu a niyadu'an inai' tu ku muenengay. . Cin-tun-ce sabaw tulu a mihcaan "caywalpicsip mihcaan" katukuh Kun-sui tusa a mihcaan " caywalpicnem mihcaan" sa, tayniyan ni Sen-paw-cen itini i Taywan misangan tu tuluay a dadanan sapitulun tu wali, nutipan nu dadan a " amisa dadan", itawyaay a nikilukan tu sayaway nu sakakaay misangaay tu dadanan, katukuh tu kaDipunan mibelihaca misangan, u aydaay nu Su-hua-kun-lu. kaDipunan u sihu t uku misangaay tu He-hun-san dadan atu nikudan u Cung-hua-min-kuo sisu misanga tu Cung-hen-kun-lu, malailabuay nu angangangan nu sakatahekal a dadan nu aaidangan. ta-cen sepatay a mihcaan " caysiwcaylim mihcaan", panan nu Tayluke misangan tu sapilakuuyt tu Li-u-si a "sin-hun-ciw", u tawyaay nu micumuday tu Tayluke dihep a sayaway nu telayay a dadanan, nikalepacawan satu nikudan sumad han u "cen-cun-ciw".

== Tay-lo-ke-koo-cia-kon-yen 太魯閣國家公園 == Tay-lo-ke-koo-cia-kon-yen " Taloko a kamo: Rngayan qmita kana klwaan Troko" o Cong-hao-min-koo sakasepat no nipatidenga to kanatal konyen. sakatosa a nikalepacawan no kanatal a tataydaan midang, caysiwwalnem mihcaan cacay bolad cayto demiad pakatineng to kiyako, caysiwwalnem mihcaan caycay bolad towal demiad mapatideng ko mamikowan a kakolian. Itida i Taywan Walian, milakooyt to Kalinko, Taycio, Nantoo tolo a naniyado'an. ilabo idaw ko wali nitipan a mibetasay to boyo'a dadanan, pangangan han o Congheng dadan. picidekan no Tayloko a koo-cia-kon-yen o dihep ato nanggay, motikel to ko nanggay, bangcal sapi'," Tay-lo-ke nangnanggayan" sisa singangan to sakawalo no Taywan aaidangan. doma sato ilabo no boyoboyoan idaw henay ko madipotay no yadahay a kacodetay no nanom a mahicaay no nanomay a cilekayan, mahida o boting aca. . "Tay-lo-ke-koo-cia-kon-yen" tada motikel to ko nanggay, sasawacan, ahebalay no lalaliwan no nanom malasapihpih ko lalaliwan ato dihep no kitidaan, matatongos to kitakid no namakababalakiay no malocekay to sakapito: ato sawsawni celak saca a talakaw, sisa masatanektekay no talakaway a dihepan no aadihan a Tayloke, o canancanan no yadahay ato picidekan no matatongosay i kitakidan a nikasinganganan to mamalocek a sakasiwan no silacan, sisa, caay henay ka longad ko nipalomaan to kilakilangan, sisa yadah ko canancanan no toodan a aadopan to sasapapahanhannan yadah ko mhicacay a aadopan ato caayay a saosi no cancanan, masasoida namin ko noheni, matatongosay no kitikid a naliwnan namaka babalakiay ni tokian no matatongosay a sakacacay a bataan , sisa ina wen-ha-po mapili' o Taywan kitakid namaka babalakiay a liwan no tataydaan midang. " . ngangan 名稱 "Tayloke" ato " Taloko" nina solit o namaka Tayloke binacadan nipanganganan to " Troko". sabaw enem a secian no ayaw nikodan, Sedi'k tademaw namaka Nan-too milakooyt to Cong-yen-san-may a boyo'an mabolaw taynin i Kalingko a Li-o'-si, Mo-koa-si, sa moenengay i Kalingkoay a binacadan to palotatengaan to odip, sisa pangngan han to " Tayloke binacadan". tada ngihan o " Troko", i kaDiponan singangan to "Taroko", nikahinian tonika enengan no heni itini to kasingangan. " "Troko".16 "Troko" ,日治時期被稱為"Taroko" ," . loit歷史沿革 nina kiyako taneng tanoayawan ko nipilalaba to kaDiponan no kiyako a Tayloke koocia kongyen. Caysiwlopic mihcaan sabaw tosa a bolad tosa a bataan idaw ko pito a demiadan, Tay-wan-cong-to-ho Koo-li-kon-yen pakatineng " sakatosa no talakaw Tayloke Kooli konyen" mapatideng, paso aydaay a Sea-san ato Tay-lo-ke a kitidaan, nikitidaan makaala to tosa abataan idaw ko pito a wangan no koboan, nika i ka Diponan hedeken palawpesen. 65 263 . cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo tolo a bataan idaw ko enem no mihcaan to siwa a bolad, Taywan no hitay a sakakaay ci Ten-con-liw, itida i Kalinko mididaw sa itida i Tayloke sacomod ato ilaboay no talakaway mo bois a tademaw ci Son-pen-ta-coo, Lin-ten-ho-kon, Di-co mapolong a misasing. 1936年 9月, . katokoh to cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo pito a bataan idaw ko siwa a mihcaan, o Sin-cen-yen mapatocek to " Taywan kitidaan no polong sapitadas a kiyako", patocek hank o Tayloke a kitidaan, Cong-heng dadan, He-hon-san itidaay ato So-hoa dadan o kanatal a konyen ato kanatal a dadan no konyen, sadikoday i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo walo a bataan idw ko sepat a mihcaan mihedek to nikakenihan to kanatal a konyenan. Cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo walo a bataan idaw ko enem a mihcaan sabaw cacay a bolad sabaw tosa a demiad, kiyako no Tayloke kanatal a konyen tatengan pakatineng, kitidaan no kanatal a konyen timol amis no tanayo hakiya makaala to 38 kon-li, wali notipan a ahebal hakiya makaala to 41 kon-li, kitidaan polong han 92,000 a koboan, mapolong to kakolian pasoKalinko Siw-lin-sing 74,800 a koboan, Tay-cong-se he-pin-ci 9,500 kobo ato Nan-too-sin Zen-ay-sing 7,700 kobo, Tayloke kanatal kon-yen pipahalhalan ato sayaway no sakakaay a co'-cen o Koo-li-ton-hoa-ta-sye ce-zan-ce-yen kon-li yen-ciw-soo o sakakaay ci Si-koo-se. 至1979年, . toseptosip mihcaan sepat bolad tolo demiad, ninelan no Kalingko mapelad ko Tayloke kanatal konyen, micidek ko cacolilan i boyoboyoan, dekalon cacolilan, padaicawan a cacolilan, sakatang cacolilan, payyeng cacolilan ato cemo sangaw cacolilan a aaidangan ato sakayhekal no dadanan mamin mapelad, pinaay hakiya no taydaay midang a madoka mapatay ato pinaay no malebotan a midangay mapolo' i labo no aaidangan, tawya nikaninelan no Tayloke kanatal kon-yen mikowanay patahekal mosakamo acaay pacomod to tayniay midang sa, misangaay a tademaw ayaan hakiya a masangan nai' ko watan, po'tan ko sakatayda katokoh to nikakapah kiya tawya mosakamo taneng to a micomod sa. 2024年4月3日, . hida sananay a liwliw 自然環境 kanatal aidangan mitolin to Tay-pin-yeng, Cong-yen-sa-may amis milakooyt to aaidangan, satalakaway no aaidangan makaala to 3,742 konce a Nan-ho boyo'. talakaw makaala to tolo a malebot no pinaay anika talakawan no co'detay a kitidaan kakitidaan makaala to kanatal kon-yen a liklikan to 7.2%, saka itini i cacay a lasoboan no Taywan to boyo' an no polong to sakatosa a bataan idaw ko pito a boyo'an. cacay a malebot katokoh tolo a malebot no dihekoay a boyo'an no kitidaan mamin makaala to 78.4%, salikelon 55% a kitidaan miala to aaidangan to 44.7%. 44.7%. nanom namakaydaay namin i Cong-yen-san-may no nikakenisan a nananoman, walian no angangan o Li-o-si kapolongan a nanoman, miala to kanatal a lalaan 65.7%, adidi' ko i Mo-koa-si ato San-cen-si no lalaliwan no nanoman, tipan makakenih o Ta-cia-si ato Coo-soo-si pabawan, ninatosaay a masabanaway a tangkoan miala to kanatal to lala'an a 20%. 20%. polong no timol, amis talakaw ko lala', iteban han o O-ya-ba'to ato Hoy-li-pin ba'to sakababateloan a kakenisan ato Tay-pin-yen notipan a kacaledesan kasibaliyosan no tabakiay a odadan no kitidaan, sisa mahicaay kiya kina kitidaan. matolin to a misaamelik misangan to boyo'an, ato Li-o-si kaseno' sa mahetik, malamahicaay kiya a boyo'an, o dihep han to. likeco ko Tay-lo-ke mala V yan no daylisiki a dihepan, ilabo milakooyt to 1,000 kon-ce, kibetol no daylisiki o kibetol makaala to malebot no pina a kon-cean, nikalahatan makaala to pina no cacay a bataan no ko-lian. 全區南, V . maodipay no canacanan 生態 saan ko nipikinsaan, ilabo idaw to konikaadihan to toodan no canananan no maodipay a cicilekayan to 1,517 an. ilabo no boyoboyo'an idaw ko 46 a micocoay no aadopan, mikiala to Tay-wan i enelay no micocoay a aadopan to pangkiwan. sabaw lima ko no Taywanay a micidekay no aadopan, i Taywan o noedoan ko sayadahay a aadopan.o ayam hanto makaala to 173 a canancananan, pasoTaywan picidekan no ayaman makaala to 24 a kakenisan, nikakenisan namaka Cong-heng dadan Ta-yi-lin katokoh i Ce-n sayadahay no ayaman itida. . tademaw lalangawan no aadihan人文景觀 ayda idaw to konikaadihan to liwan namaka babalakiay, itida i Li-o-si tapang no kawanan, panan no Tayloko no ayawan 100 no pina a kon-ce pabaway no nanoman, micapiay to kanatal kon-yen kiyakoan a Ho-se liwan no namaka babalakiay a kitidaan, katokoh ayda makaala to 2,000 a loitan. kanatal kon-yen naw Tayloko a binacadan no kitidaan, Malahat kina niyado', domaan to a niyado'an inai' to ko moenengay. . Cin-ton-ce sabaw tolo a mihcaan "caywalpicsip mihcaan" katokoh Kon-soi tosa a mihcaan " caywalpicnem mihcaan" sa, tayniyan ni Sen-paw-cen itini i Taywan misangan to toloay a dadanan sapitolon to wali, notipan no dadan a " amisa dadan", itawyaay a nikilokan to sayaway no sakakaay misangaay to dadanan, katokoh to kaDiponan mibelihaca misangan, o aydaay no So-hoa-kon-lo. kaDiponan o siho t oko misangaay to He-hon-san dadan ato nikodan o Cong-hoa-min-koo siso misanga to Cong-hen-kon-lo, malailaboay no angangangan no sakatahekal a dadan no aaidangan. ta-cen sepatay a mihcaan " caysiwcaylim mihcaan", panan no Tayloke misangan to sapilakooyt to Li-o-si a "sin-hon-ciw", o tawyaay no micomoday to Tayloke dihep a sayaway no telayay a dadanan, nikalepacawan sato nikodan somad han o "cen-con-ciw".
